data.lyric:
[ti:Come Through (Explicit)]
[ar:H.E.R./Chris Brown]
[al:Come Through (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Come Through (Explicit) - H.E.R./Chris Brown (克里斯·布朗)
[00:04.91]Lyrics by：H.E.R./Chris Brown/Carl McCormick/Tiara Thomas
[00:09.82]Composed by：H.E.R./Chris Brown/Carl McCormick/Tiara Thomas
[00:14.74]Almost missed my flight today
[00:18.21]I look good even though I feel s**tty
[00:21.66]I just got back out this way
[00:25.32]You already got plans for the city
[00:28.71]Call 'em off could you call 'em off for me
[00:32.36]You're always going on and on
[00:35.84]Got it all ask me why I'll never leave
[00:39.47]I don't go out much
[00:41.56]But you should come through tonight
[00:44.19]I'm chilling on the Westside boo
[00:46.61]Call my homegirl tell your best friend he could slide too
[00:50.15]On the low a remote location
[00:53.14]I don't want them seein' me getting faded
[00:55.77]You should come through tonight
[00:58.25]I only kick it with a tight crew
[01:00.28]They won't tell 'cause they tryna live they best life too
[01:04.23]On the low on my own I'll be wavy
[01:07.24]Hit me on my phone I'll be waiting
[01:09.85]Yeah yeah
[01:11.27]Looking at you cry going crazy
[01:14.82]If I could I would take the pain away
[01:18.25]I don't see that smile I made
[01:21.79]You already made plans that ain't with me
[01:25.20]Trying hard I been trying hard to breathe
[01:28.86]Inhale exhale you expel what you been doing to me
[01:32.37]Fighting it off you been fighting me off for weeks
[01:35.93]Don't leave 'cause I need ya
[01:38.14]But you should come through tonight
[01:40.57]I'm chilling on the Westside boo
[01:43.12]Call my homegirl tell your best friend he could slide too
[01:46.63]On the low a remote location
[01:49.65]I don't want them seein' me getting faded
[01:52.32]You should come through tonight
[01:54.64]I only kick it with a tight crew
[01:57.00]They won't tell 'cause they tryna live they best life too
[02:00.61]On the low on my own I'll be wavy
[02:03.62]Hit me on my phone I'll be waiting
[02:06.34]Yeah yeah
[02:07.63]I ain't really tryna spend no time
[02:11.09]In the house if you ask me how I'm feeling
[02:14.65]I said yes to going out tonight
[02:18.08]Oh I ain't did that in a minute
[02:21.65]Called it off oh I called it off for you
[02:25.29]You're always going on and on
[02:28.68]Ask me why oh why I'm not with you
[02:32.31]I don't go out much
[02:34.41]But you should come through tonight
[02:37.02]I'm chilling on the Westside boo
[02:39.54]Call my homegirl tell your best friend he could slide too
[02:43.02]On the low a remote location
[02:46.08]I don't want them seein' me getting faded
[02:48.72]You should come through tonight
[02:51.15]I only kick it with a tight crew
[02:53.18]They won't tell 'cause they tryna live they best life too
[02:57.08]On the low on my own I'll be wavy
[03:00.17]Hit me on my phone I'll be waiting
[03:02.72]Yeah yeah
[03:04.75]Faded uh
[03:07.32]Hit me on my phone I'll be waiting waiting
[03:11.16]Yeah yeah yeah uh
[03:14.21]Hit me on my phone hit me on my phone yeah
[03:17.85]Ooh I'll be waiting yeah
[03:23.12]Hitting me alone oh yeah yeah
[03:26.65]Give me a call oh yeah yeah
[03:29.85]Give me a call yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Come Through (Explicit)]
[ar:H.E.R./Chris Brown]
[al:Come Through (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.91]//
[00:09.82]//
[00:14.74]我差点错过今天的航班
[00:18.21]我看上去很好 尽管内心感觉糟透
[00:21.66]我刚刚回到正轨
[00:25.32]你已经计划好在这座城市要怎么过
[00:28.71]把他们叫走 你能不能为了我把他们叫走
[00:32.36]你总是喋喋不休
[00:35.84]你什么都有了 还要问我为什么我永远都在这里
[00:39.47]我不常出门
[00:41.56]但你今晚应该过来找我
[00:44.19]我在西区放松心情 亲爱的
[00:46.61]打电话给我的闺中密友 跟你最好的朋友说 他也可以走了
[00:50.15]在心情低落的时候 呆在与世隔绝的角落
[00:53.14]我不想让他们看见我慢慢垂头丧气
[00:55.77]你今晚应该过来找我
[00:58.25]我只会和关系紧密的朋友们玩在一起
[01:00.28]他们不会说什么 因为他们也想快乐生活
[01:04.23]在心情低落的时候 独自一人 我会经历情绪的波动
[01:07.24]打电话给我 我会等着
[01:09.85]//
[01:11.27]看着你嚎啕大哭 变得疯狂
[01:14.82]如果我可以 我愿意抹去你的痛苦
[01:18.25]我没有看见我脸上挤出了笑容
[01:21.79]你已经制定了没有我的计划
[01:25.20]竭尽全力 我竭尽全力呼吸
[01:28.86]吸气 吐气 你忘掉了你对我做了什么
[01:32.37]跟我争吵 你已经跟我争吵了几周
[01:35.93]不要走 因为我需要你
[01:38.14]但你今晚应该过来找我
[01:40.57]我在西区放松心情 亲爱的
[01:43.12]打电话给我的闺中密友 跟你最好的朋友说 他也可以走了
[01:46.63]在心情低落的时候 呆在与世隔绝的角落
[01:49.65]我不想让他们看见我慢慢垂头丧气
[01:52.32]你今晚应该过来找我
[01:54.64]我只会和关系紧密的朋友们玩在一起
[01:57.00]他们不会说什么 因为他们也想快乐生活
[02:00.61]在心情低落的时候 独自一人 我会经历情绪的波动
[02:03.62]打电话给我 我会等着
[02:06.34]//
[02:07.63]我不想浪费时间
[02:11.09]在家里 你要是问我感觉如何
[02:14.65]我应允了你 今晚跟你出去
[02:18.08]我没有犹豫就同意了
[02:21.65]取消 我为你取消了计划
[02:25.29]你总是喋喋不休
[02:28.68]问我为什么 为什么不跟你一起
[02:32.31]我不常出门
[02:34.41]但你今晚应该过来找我
[02:37.02]我在西区放松心情 亲爱的
[02:39.54]打电话给我的闺中密友 跟你最好的朋友说 他也可以走了
[02:43.02]在心情低落的时候 呆在与世隔绝的角落
[02:46.08]我不想让他们看见我慢慢垂头丧气
[02:48.72]你今晚应该过来找我
[02:51.15]我只会和关系紧密的朋友们玩在一起
[02:53.18]他们不会说什么 因为他们也想快乐生活
[02:57.08]在心情低落的时候 独自一人 我会经历情绪的波动
[03:00.17]打电话给我 我会等着
[03:02.72]//
[03:04.75]垂头丧气
[03:07.32]打电话给我 我会等着 等着
[03:11.16]//
[03:14.21]打电话给我 打电话给我
[03:17.85]我会等着
[03:23.12]打电话给我
[03:26.65]打电话给我
[03:29.85]打电话给我
